Checkout Module/views/checkout

checkout.views.checkout_view(request)[source]

Handle the checkout process and create an order.

Parameters:

request – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Renders the checkout page or redirects after order creation.

Return type:

HttpResponse

Notes

Uses a temporary mock cart until the real cart is integrated. Stores cart items in the session for receipt generation.
